name: code-organizer
description: References: https://newline.theironyard.com/cohorts/18/courses/10/objective_lessons/161 https://github.com/bbryant7/bef-week2-day3-mongoose-lecture https://github.com/bbryant7/kitten-adoption [] create app.js file [] create models folder for schema [] create schema [] create views folder and mustache files [] install   -Mongoose   -blue bird   -Express   -mustache Express   -mustache   -body parser [] include boiler plate [] connect models file: module.exports example const kitten = mongoose.model('kitten', kittenSchema); module.exports = kitten; [] create get and connect to mustache files [] create login page, directs to home page [] home page - renders all snippets [] create drop down menu of languages and submit button [] submit button directs to a specific filter of the snippets (title) [] give each snippet a link - directs to a render of that specific snippet [] create form   -adds snippet to renders [] create "tag" form
